name: Space Rover: idle mars tycoon
description:
Do you like space exploration simulation games or just idle games with space exploring? Install that one of the best simulation games to discover Mars, mine minerals, set up your own factory for processing space minerals, and become a true space miner tycoon.

Space Rover is a truly space simulator game with easy gameplay that allows you to focus on exploring the planet to mining new alien minerals and become fast an idle space farmer. Everything you see on the screen is designed to help you easily immerse yourself in the gameplay.

CONTROL the space rover with one hand. You don't have to click on the screen, because it's not a clicker, just guide the rover with the joystick.

EXPLORE SPACES of MARS to find new technologies, minerals or aliens.

MINE the space minerals on Mars. Just drive up to them to get the resource, and then take it to your space base.

UPGRADE your rover to earn more money. Expand your cargo to mine more minerals, upgrade your speed to increase the efficiency of your space factory.

BECOME the most famous idle space tycoon.

Become a space mining factory tycoon, build an empire, earn money, build your space business and get rich in this idle tycoon simulator game where you can make money by investing in upgrades of your rover!

Upgrade your space rover to expand your mining and increase the productivity of your rover who will automate the workflow of your factory! Create the manager strategy to mine as many space minerals as possible in this idle tycoon simulator. This is not a clicker mining game: no need for endless tapping like other clickers or idle simulator.

Features of IDLE ROVER:
— Automate your rover mine and factory to make more idle income: No need to tap like in an online clicker mining simulator! Enjoy the best tycoon simulation game!
— Get idle cash and earn money & gold: Stay in business when you're offline! If you like games without the internet - it's your game!
— Build up your idle space empire without the endless clicking you experience in other clicker games and tycoon games!
— Manage space rover like a boss: become a space mining tycoon by managing this space miner simulator!
— Become a true space miner! Mine mars' resources.
— Playing without internet.
